questions.title: Hello, world!
questions.content: Welcome to CodeCraft! Make a program that prints to the screen the output below.
questions.output: slkdjflskdjflskjalsj231253132

questions.title: Goodbye!
questions.content: Welcome to CodeCraft! Make a program that prints to the screen the output below.
questions.output: slkdjflskdjflskjalsj231253132

questions.title: hihihihihihihi!
questions.content: Welcome to CodeCraft! Make a program that prints to the screen the output below.
questions.output: slkdjflskdjflskjalsj231253132

questions.title: FizzBuzz
questions.content: Write a program that prints the numbers from 1 to n. But for multiples of three, print 'Fizz' instead of the number, and for the multiples of five, print 'Buzz'. For numbers that are multiples of both three and five, print 'FizzBuzz'.
questions.output: Output n lines, each containing one number or 'Fizz', 'Buzz', or 'FizzBuzz' as per the rules described above.

questions.title: Palindrome
questions.content: Write a program to determine if a given string is a palindrome.
questions.input: A string consisting of lowercase and/or uppercase English letters.
questions.output: Output 'true' if the input string is a palindrome, and 'false' otherwise.

questions.title: Factorial
questions.content: Write a program to calculate the factorial of a non-negative integer n.
questions.output: Output the factorial of n.

questions.title: Anagram
questions.content: Write a program to determine if two strings are anagrams of each other.
questions.input: Two strings consisting of lowercase and/or uppercase English letters.
questions.output: Output 'true' if the two strings are anagrams, and 'false' otherwise.

questions.title: Reverse Integer
questions.content: Write a program to reverse an integer.
questions.output: Return the reversed integer.

questions.title: Valid Parentheses
questions.content: Write a program to determine if a string containing just the characters '(', ')', '{', '}', '[' and ']' is valid.
questions.input: A string containing just the characters '(', ')', '{', '}', '[' and ']'.
questions.output: Output 'true' if the input string is valid, and 'false' otherwise.

questions.title: Longest Common Subsequence
questions.content: Write a program to find the length of the longest common subsequence of two given strings.
questions.output: Output the length of the longest common subsequence.

questions.title: Maximum Subarray
questions.content: Write a program to find the contiguous subarray within an array that has the largest sum.
questions.output: Output the sum of the contiguous subarray.

questions.title: Two Sum
questions.content: Write a program to find two numbers such that they add up to a specific target.
questions.input: An array of integers and an integer target.
questions.output: Output the indices of the two numbers such that they add up to the target.

questions.title: Merge Two Sorted Lists
questions.content: Write a program to merge two sorted linked lists and return it as a new sorted list.
questions.output: Output the merged sorted linked list.

questions.title: Rotate Array
questions.content: Write a program to rotate an array to the right by k steps, where k is non-negative.
questions.input: An array of integers and an integer k.
questions.output: Output the rotated array.

questions.title: Valid Palindrome
questions.content: Write a program to determine if a given string is a valid palindrome.
questions.input: A string consisting of alphanumeric characters.
questions.output: Output 'true' if the input string is a valid palindrome, and 'false' otherwise.

questions.title: Jump Game
questions.content: Write a program to determine if you can reach the last index of an array from the first index.
questions.output: Output 'true' if you can reach the last index, and 'false' otherwise.

questions.title: Container With Most Water
questions.content: Write a program to find the maximum area of a container formed by vertical lines given an array of heights where the width of the container is one unit.
questions.input: An array of non-negative integers representing the heights of the lines.
questions.output: Output the maximum area of the container.

questions.title: 3Sum
questions.content: Write a program to find all unique triplets in the array which gives the sum of zero.
questions.output: Output all unique triplets.

questions.title: Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array
questions.content: Write a program to remove duplicates from a sorted array in-place such that each element appears only once and returns the new length.
questions.output: Output the length of the array after removing duplicates and the modified array.

questions.title: Subsets
questions.content: Write a program to generate all possible subsets of a set of distinct integers.
questions.output: Output all possible subsets.
